bibl.title: Three Papyri: Two Frames.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: Edition of two demotic documents with Greek registrations, P. BM [P. Lond.] Inv. EA 10393 and 10385 [for the Greek registrations, see S.B. I, 5634 = U.P.Z. I, 129]. - P. BM EA 10393: Physical Description. - EA 10385: Physical Description. - Commentary. - The order of the fragments. - Text 1: P. BM EA 10393. Demotic contract. Memphis, 124 BC. - Text 2: P. BM EA 10385. Sale or transfert of real estate. Memphis, 124 BC. - Black Ink Stamp.
bibl.seg: Cary J. Martin, Three Papyri: Two Frames.
British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 23 (2016) pp. 71-94, 5 figg. coul.

Edition of two demotic documents with Greek registrations, P. BM [P. Lond.] Inv. EA 10393 and 10385 [for the Greek registrations, see S.B. I, 5634 = U.P.Z. I, 129]. - P.
